title: God's Children
description: God loves you, because He created you as His own image. He loves us so much that he gave His only Son, Jesus Christ. God so loved the world He gave His only begotten Son, that whosoever believes in Him should not perish, but have everlasting life. And every child's best friend is Jesus Christ. This book tells about His love with beautiful pictures and Biblical words.
author: Pertti A. Pietarinen
